document_data.mainbody:
Greater spell breach was an abjuration spell cast by sorcerers and wizards.
This spell stripped the target of up to four magical defenses (such as globe of invulnerability, stoneskin, protection from elements, death armor, or mage armor), starting from the most potent one. It also reduced the targets resistance against magic for a minute. This spell was a more powerful version of lesser spell breach.
The spell required verbal and somatic components.
